ABOUT US
RESOURCES
Analytics

Get a consolidated view of spending data and take advantage of customizable reports.

Contact us Get the Analytics eBook
Get the insights you need to make better business decisions

With a unified view of your SAP Concur data, you can empower key stakeholders with the information they need to understand and impact the bottom line. With Analytics you and your stakeholders can:

See up-to-date data to drive actionable insights
Personalize views with interactive dashboards and customizable reports
Manage spending proactively with alerts and reports delivered directly to inboxes

Watch the video

Here's what you can do with Analytics
See all of your spend data

Collect and synthesize data from your SAP Concur solutions to provide a single, consolidated view into your spending.

Get accurate data when you need it

Data is automatically and constantly refreshed so you can make timely decisions that directly impact cash flow.

Interact with dashboards and reports

Have digestible information at your fingertips and in an intuitive format. Filter, group, or edit reports and dashboards to tailor information to your specific needs.

Share reports with key stakeholders

Schedule reports and distribute them to key stakeholders so they always have the right information at the right time.

Manage spending with alerts

Stay on top of your spending to better manage your cash flow and spend against policy with scheduled alerts.

Benefit from expert advice

Analytics Reporting Service enhances your experience by providing unlimited access to reporting consultants who can help develop your reporting strategy.

We are now able to move away from basic Excel spreadsheet expense reports to a better organization and management tool that has strong reporting and evaluation tools built in. We can see trends over time and track down certain expense items while ensuring a proper audit trail."

SAP Concur administrator
Read the full review
Contact us about a better way to handle expense, travel, and invoice management

To hear from an SAP Concur representative, please complete the form or call us at 1800-1020-650.

Tell us the travel & expense management issues you are interested in solving.
